Description:
Required skills to be successful:Job-specific skills:Good communication & Presentation skills with an ability to compile tender documents with full commercial & contractual understanding.
Good working knowledge of Excel, Word, PowerPoint & VISIO.
Working knowledge of AutoCAD will be an added advantage.
Languages: English / Arabic
Communication: Highly motivated and strong team player with excellent communication skills
An excellent customer service attitude and the ability to interact with customers in a professional manner are required. What equips you for the role:Minimum Qualifications and Knowledge: Graduate Engineer in Electronics / Electrical or equivalent
CTS certification is mandatory. CTS-D is preferred.Minimum Experience:Minimum 5+ years of experience in Designing and project management for AV System.Job Details
